nl_question: Who has played a role in all the following movies: 'Love Is the Drug', 'Crashing', 'Cloverfield', 'My Best Friend's Girl', 'Hot Tub Time Machine', 'The Last Rites of Ransom Pride', 'Save the Date', 'Bachelorette', '3, 2, 1...
